name: Johnny Turbo's Bandit Hunter Turbo
description:
Join Johnny Turbo in his quest to save the Wild Wild West. Bring a band of hooligans to justice. Become the badass gunslinger you've always dreamed of.

Controls:

W - Move up

S - Move Down

Left-Click - Shoot

Move mouse to the left side or right side of the screen to rotate the player.

Gameplay:

You will have bandits holding guns coming at you. Each time you kill one you will gain 5 seconds on your timer. Each time you are hit by one of their bullets you will lose 5 seconds on your timer. The game is over when the timer hits 0.

There are also bankers that will spawn occasionally. These bankers will try to escape. If they escape without getting shot, you will gain 15 seconds on your timer. Beware though, you can shoot the bankers and doing so will cause you to lose 5 seconds on your timer. The bandits can also shoot the bankers so protect them with your life!
